sentences.en: Foundation make-up evens out your skin tone and texture.
sentences.cn: 底妆让你的肤色和肤质均匀。

sentences.en: He is founding director of The Conservation Foundation.
sentences.cn: 他是自然资源保护基金会的创办负责人。

sentences.en: He laid the foundation of the science of bacteriology.
sentences.cn: 他为细菌学科学奠定了基础.

sentences.en: I am determined to build on this solid foundation.
sentences.cn: 我决定在这个坚实的基础之上继续努力。

sentences.en: It took the builders three weeks to lay the foundations .
sentences.cn: 建筑工人花了三星期的时间打地基。

sentences.en: It took the builders three weeks to lay the foundations.
sentences.cn: 建筑工人花了三星期的时间打地基。

sentences.en: She dug the foundation with a pick and shovel.
The Bush Foundation has funded a variety of faculty development programs.
sentences.cn: 布什基金会已经资助了许多教员发展项目。

sentences.en: The earthquake shook the foundations of the house.
sentences.cn: 地震动摇了那幢房子的地基。

sentences.en: The Ford Foundation allocated millions of dollars for cancer research.
sentences.cn: 福特基金会拨款数百万美元用于癌症研究.

sentences.en: The Foundation gives money to help artists.
sentences.cn: 那家基金会捐款帮助艺术家.

sentences.en: The Foundation is holding a dinner in honour of something or other.
sentences.cn: 基金会正举办某个纪念宴会。

sentences.en: The foundation of the university took place 600 years ago.
sentences.cn: 这所大学是600年前创办的.

sentences.en: The legend has thus much of foundation.
sentences.cn: 这个传说只有这么多的根据.

sentences.en: the tercentenary of the school's foundation
The theory made the greatest pretence of having a scientific foundation.
sentences.cn: 那学说号称最具有科学基础.

sentences.en: This old house has a very solid foundation.
sentences.cn: 这所旧房子有非常结实的地基.

sentences.en: to lay the foundation stone of the new museum

phrases.tran_cn: 奠定基础；奠基；打下基础
[英国英语]领取基金会提供奖学金(或津贴)的；属于由基金维持的机构的

trans.tran_cn: 基础，创办，地基，基金会，粉底
trans.tran_en: the solid layer of  cement  , bricks, stones etc that is put under a building to support it
